title: opencode-snippets Configuration
description: Configuration file for the opencode-snippets plugin

booleanSetting.description: Boolean setting that accepts true, false, "enabled", or "disabled"

$schema.description: JSON Schema URL for editor autocompletion

debug.description: Enable debug logging to file. Logs are written to ~/.config/opencode/logs/snippets/daily/

experimental.description: Experimental features (may change or be removed in future versions)

skillRendering.description: Enable skill rendering with <skill>name</skill> or <skill name="name" /> syntax. When enabled, skill tags are replaced with the skill's content body. Skills are loaded from OpenCode's standard skill directories.

installSkill.description: Automatically install SKILL.md to global skill directory. When enabled, the snippets skill is copied to ~/.config/opencode/skill/snippets/ so the LLM understands how to use snippets.

hideCommandInOutput.description: Hide the shell command in snippet output. When false (default), shell commands show as '$ command\n--> output'. When true, only the output is shown (matching OpenCode's slash command behavior).
